name: Broken Reality (itch) (Shadowaduro)
description:
Broken Reality is a very poor game developed for the Alpha @S!F End of Semester Game Jam 5 with the themes enlightenment and possession. 

I can't say I am proud of this game, because there is no art to it at all but I made a game and that's what matters :3 

Your character is a snobby fellow in their early twenties, their life has been going fantastic and they have basically gotten everything they could have wanted - but then, this goddess figure started appearing in their dreams, soon enough they awoke to her voice speaking to them, bringing the truth that it was all a lie. This reality, your perfect life, all of it.

Will you take back your body and force out whatever possessed you or will you stay in the crumbling reality so that you can maintain getting everything you could want?

This game was made primarily solo by Ashley Johnson 

With Scripts from Josh Ferguson 

And Character Voice Acting from Bryn Dwyer 

(P.S DIALOGUE VOLUME IS LOW SO BE prepared to turn volume up high to be able to hear it)
